Name: Earl's Regency Kandy
Features: Outdoor pool, Spa and wellness center, Fitness center, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Room service, Free Wi-Fi, Tea/coffee maker
Description: Earls Regency Kandy is a luxurious hotel nestled in the heart of Kandy, Sri Lanka. Surrounded by lush greenery and overlooking stunning mountain vistas, this hotel offers a serene retreat for travelers. With its outdoor pool, spa, fitness center, and multiple dining options, Earls Regency promises a rejuvenating experience. Guests can enjoy modern amenities such as free Wi-Fi and in-room tea/coffee makers. Whether visiting for leisure or business, Earls Regency Kandy provides an unforgettable stay.

Name: Mahaweli Reach Hotel
Features: Outdoor pool, Spa and wellness center, Fitness center, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Room service, Free Wi-Fi, Coffee shop
Description: Mahaweli Reach Hotel is an elegant retreat located along the banks of the Mahaweli River in Kandy, Sri Lanka. The hotel offers breathtaking views of the river and lush surroundings. Guests can indulge in the outdoor pool, spa treatments, and fitness facilities. The hotels restaurant and bar serve a variety of cuisine and drinks, while the coffee shop offers a cozy spot to relax. With free Wi-Fi and attentive room service, Mahaweli Reach Hotel ensures a comfortable and memorable stay.

Name: Cinnamon Citadel Kandy
Features: Outdoor pool, Spa and wellness center, Fitness center, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Room service, Free Wi-Fi, Tennis court
Description: Situated amidst the lush greenery of Kandy, Sri Lanka, Cinnamon Citadel offers a luxurious retreat overlooking the scenic Mahaweli River. Guests can relax in the outdoor pool, indulge in spa treatments, or stay active in the fitness center and tennis court. The hotels restaurant and bar serve delectable dishes and drinks, while free Wi-Fi and attentive room service ensure a comfortable stay. With its picturesque setting and top-notch amenities, Cinnamon Citadel Kandy provides a memorable experience for guests.

Name: Amaya Hills Kandy
Features: Outdoor pool, Spa and wellness center, Fitness center, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Room service, Free Wi-Fi, Business center
Description: Nestled amidst the hills of Kandy, Sri Lanka, Amaya Hills offers a tranquil escape with panoramic views of the surrounding mountains and lush greenery. Guests can unwind in the outdoor pool, pamper themselves with spa treatments, or stay active in the fitness center. The hotels restaurant and bar serve a variety of delicious dishes and drinks, while free Wi-Fi and a business center cater to the needs of business travelers. With its serene ambiance and modern amenities, Amaya Hills Kandy promises a relaxing and rejuvenating stay.

Name: The Grand Kandyan Hotel
Features: Outdoor pool, Spa and wellness center, Fitness center, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Room service, Free Wi-Fi, Conference facilities
Description: The Grand Kandyan Hotel offers a blend of luxury and traditional charm in the heart of Kandy, Sri Lanka. Surrounded by lush greenery and overlooking the cityscape, the hotel provides a peaceful retreat for guests. With its outdoor pool, spa, and fitness center, guests can relax and rejuvenate during their stay. The hotels restaurant and bar offer a diverse menu of culinary delights and refreshing drinks. Free Wi-Fi and conference facilities cater to the needs of both leisure and business travelers. With its warm hospitality and modern amenities, The Grand Kandyan Hotel ensures a memorable stay for all guests.

Name: OZO Kandy
Features: Rooftop pool, Fitness center, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Free Wi-Fi, Meeting facilities
Description: OZO Kandy offers modern and comfortable accommodations in the heart of Kandy, Sri Lanka. The hotel features a rooftop pool with panoramic views of the city, a fitness center, and meeting facilities for business travelers. Guests can dine at the hotels restaurant and unwind at the bar/lounge. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property, ensuring guests stay connected during their visit.

Name: The Golden Crown Hotel
Features: Outdoor pool, Spa and wellness center, Fitness center, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Room service, Free Wi-Fi, Garden
Description: The Golden Crown Hotel is a luxurious retreat nestled amidst the scenic hills of Kandy, Sri Lanka. Guests can relax in the outdoor pool, indulge in spa treatments, or stay active in the fitness center. The hotels restaurant offers a diverse menu of local and international cuisine, while the bar/lounge is the perfect place to unwind with a drink. With its tranquil garden setting and modern amenities, The Golden Crown Hotel provides a peaceful escape for guests.

Name: Hotel Topaz
Features: Outdoor pool, Spa and wellness center, Fitness center, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Room service, Free Wi-Fi, Tennis court
Description: Hotel Topaz is a charming hotel located amidst lush greenery in Kandy, Sri Lanka. The hotel features an outdoor pool, spa and wellness center, and fitness facilities for guests to enjoy. The on-site restaurant serves a variety of delicious dishes, while the bar/lounge offers a relaxing atmosphere to unwind. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property, and guests can also make use of the tennis court for recreation.

Name: Theva Residency
Features: Infinity pool, Spa and wellness center, Fitness center, Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Free Wi-Fi, Terrace
Description: heva Residency is a boutique hotel offering breathtaking views of the surrounding hills and valleys in Kandy, Sri Lanka. The hotel boasts an infinity pool, spa and wellness center, and fitness facilities for guests to relax and rejuvenate. The on-site restaurant serves gourmet cuisine with a focus on locally sourced ingredients, while the bar/lounge offers a selection of cocktails and fine wines. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property, and guests can also enjoy the panoramic views from the terrace.

Name: Heaven Seven Kandy
Features: Restaurant, Bar/Lounge, Free Wi-Fi, 24-hour front desk, Terrace
Description: Heaven Seven Kandy is a cozy hotel located in the heart of Kandy, Sri Lanka.
